mapping.scalars_with_regions: map(&merge(@[0], @[1]), zip(zip(repeat('region', length(oed_scalars[])), map(&join('-', @), oed_scalars[].region)) | map(&to_object([@]), @), map(&exclude(@, ['id', 'scenario_id', 'region', 'method', 'type', 'unit', 'technology_type', 'tags', 'source', 'comment']), oed_scalars[])))
